messages.message:
Sr. .Net Developer job opening in Scottsdale - Direct hire
shannonjones@serverlogic.com
What company? How much? Java is boring.

This company is in Scottsdale and we have an excellent relationship with them.  I am assisting my Arizona local Account Manager with this role.  This position is with International Cruise & Excursions.  We work direct with the Manager and this role would be a permanent position.  If you are interested, I would love to talk with you in more detail about this role.  You can send your resume to me directly at:  
shannonjones@serverlogic.com
I already applied for a different position with ICE and got turned down without so much as a phone call.
